mapper.select: SELECT EVENT_SEQ, EVENT_TITLE, EVENT_CONTENT, EVENT_UPLOADNAME, EVENT_CNT, EVENT_UPDAY FROM EVENT ORDER BY EVENT_SEQ DESC
SELECT EVENT_SEQ, EVENT_TITLE, EVENT_CONTENT, EVENT_UPLOADNAME, EVENT_CNT, EVENT_UPDAY FROM EVENT WHERE EVENT_SEQ=#{event_seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EVENT ( EVENT_SEQ, EVENT_TITLE, EVENT_CONTENT, EVENT_UPLOADNAME, EVENT_UPDAY, EVENT_CNT ) VALUES ( EVENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{event_title}, #{event_content}, #{event_uploadname}, SYSDATE, 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE EVENT SET EVENT_TITLE=#{event_title}, EVENT_CONTENT=#{event_content}, EVENT_UPDAY=SYSDATE, EVENT_UPLOADNAME=#{event_uploadname} WHERE EVENT_SEQ=#{event_seq}
UPDATE EVENT SET EVENT_CNT=EVENT_CNT + 1 WHERE EVENT_SEQ=#{event_seq}
